name: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban (GBA)
name_original: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban (GBA)
description:
Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban is the third Harry Potter game for the Game Boy Advance.
The Dementors are coming... and this time Harry needs his friends. Play as Harry, Ron and Hermione. Face the Dementors. All new mini games.
